abstract: President Barack Obama’s plan to limit financial risk-taking could force banks, such as Goldman Sachs or JPMorgan Chase, to shed parts of their private equity operations.
snippet: President Barack Obama’s plan to limit financial risk-taking could force banks, such as Goldman Sachs or JPMorgan Chase, to shed parts of their private equity operations.
lead_paragraph: How will President Obama’s plan to limit financial bank’s risk-taking affect the private equity industry?

headline.main: Obama’s Plan May Prompt Sale of Private Equity Assets
